/* adm5200DAO.selectAdm5200PwChangeDateCheck 사용자 비밀번호 변경일 체크 */
SELECT IFNULL((TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(T.PW_MODIFY_DTM, 6),'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) - TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) , 100) FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PW_MODIFY_DTM) AS PW_MODIFY_DTM FROM ADM5200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PW_MODIFY_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# ) T

/* adm5200DAO.selectAdm5200BeforeUsedPwCheck 사용자가 1년이내 사용했던 비밀번호 체크 */
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_PW_YN FROM ADM5200 A WHERE 1=1 AND ( A.LOG_STATE = 'I' OR A.LOG_STATE = 'U' ) AND A.LOG_TIME BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -12) AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.USR_PW = #usrPw#

/* adm5200DAO.selectPrs3000recentPassAjax 최근 비밀번호 수정일시 조회 */
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(pw_modify_dtm), 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') AS recentPwd FROM ADM5200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LOG_STATE = 'U' AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
